page.title: 12Stock Media
page.content:
I have compiled a list of my favourite Books, I then asked all the children of my school and Stock school, to vote on those books. Here is the running order:-
Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. Roald Dahl. Charlotte'S Webb. E.B.White. Bedknobs & Broomsticks. Mary Norton. The Secret Garden. Frances.H.Burnett. Heidi. Joanna Spryi. The Island of Adventure. Enid Blyton. The Borrowers. Mary Norton. The Castle of Adventure. Enid Blyton. The House at Pooh Corner. A.A.Milne.
It is very interesting that this year is the 25th anniverseary of"Charlie."
